mutants.code:
def reverse_array(arr):
    if len(arr) < 1:
        return arr
    start = 0
    end = len(arr) - 1
    while start < end:
        temp = arr[start]
        arr[start] = arr[end]
        arr[end] = temp
        start += 1
        end -= 1
    return arr

    return arr
